page.title: 07WHAT I LIKE ABOUT HADFIELD
page.content: My name is Amanda Hughes. I am eight years old. I like going to the Brownies because we make things and do little books called pocket books. When I come home from Brownies I go upstairs and look through my window. I see all the hills shining in the sky. My favourite thing is to get on my bike and have a ride round my Close. When I am on my bike riding round I keep on ringing my bell. Hadfield is a lovely place to live in because there is a good school here and a big playing field at the side of it. Hadfield is a peaceful place where little boys and girls go to play in the park. There are swings, slides and a see-saw. In my school I have made a lot of friends. My best friend is Lisa. My school is not near the main road. When I get home from school I sometimes play out on my skates.
